item.name: Don't leave any modes automatically when the machine wakes from sleep.
item.appendix: (Pass Through Mode, Browsing Mode, etc.)
KeyRemap4MacBook turns off these modes automatically because
these modes are not suitable for password input.
This setting allows you to keep these modes's states.

item.name: Pass-Through caps lock LED status
item.appendix: KeyRemap4MacBook manipulates caps lock LED according to internal caps lock state.
(For example, if you changed right option key to caps lock,
LED will be toggled each time the right option key is pressed.)
However, some devices may become unstable by this LED manipulation.
Therefore, we provide an option to suppress this behavior.
Please turn on this option if your device does not work properly
when you changed a key to caps lock.

item.name: Don't restore modifiers in the mouse event
item.appendix: For example, when you use Option+Tab to Command+Tab,
we send "Command+Click" when you did a mouse click while
pushing the Option key after you pushed Option+Tab.
"Option+Click" should be output, but this option changes this behavior.

item.name: Disable NumPad Hack
item.appendix: (Don't change Fn+JKL.. to NumPad, and other Fn+key combinations)

item.name: Unlimited rapid key repeat rate
item.appendix: (KeyRemap4MacBook limits most rapid "Delay Until Repeat" to 200ms for safe.
This setting allows you unlimited "Delay Until Repeat".)

item.name: Allow devices which Vendor ID and Product ID are zero.
item.appendix: (Be careful enabling this option.
These devices might cause system crash with KeyRemap4MacBook.)
